title: Anker’s Soundcore Life Q30 Headphones are 25% Cheaper Right Now!
description: The headphones feature all the essentials at an affordable price. The post Anker’s Soundcore Life Q30 Headphones are 25% Cheaper Right Now! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The headphones feature all the essentials at an affordable price.
text: As far as affordable audio hardware is concerned, Anker’s Soundcore brand is one of the better choices on the market right now. With that in mind, folks after a great-sounding pair of wireless headphones might want to check out the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones, which are on sale right now for 30% less than their usual retail price. As for specs, the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones come with all the essentials, including active noise cancelling and transparency modes, customizable sound profiles via a dedicated app, multipoint Bluetooth connectivity, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
As far as affordable audio hardware is concerned, Anker’s Soundcore brand is one of the better choices on the market right now. With that in mind, folks after a great-sounding pair of wireless headphones might want to check out the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones, which are on sale right now for 30% less than their usual retail price.

As for specs, the Soundcore Life Q30 headphones come with all the essentials, including active noise cancelling and transparency modes, customizable sound profiles via a dedicated app, multipoint Bluetooth connectivity, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge.
